title: Who Is Strawberry Shortcake on The Masked Singer? Watch Ken Jeong Brace for the ‘King’ of All Reveals
description: Ken Jeong thinks he knows which celebrity is hiding underneath the Strawberry Shortcake costume on The Masked Singer. There’s just one slight problem — his guess is way off. The Season 12 semifinals arrive on Wednesday’s episode (Fox, 8/7c), bringing back Strawberry Shortcake, Wasp and Buffalos to battle for the two spots in next week’s […]
author: Andy Swift
excerpt: With the 'Masked Singer' Season 12 finale approaching, Ken Jeong thinks he finally has Strawberry Shortcake all figured out.
text: Ken Jeong thinks he knows which celebrity is hiding underneath the Strawberry Shortcake costume on The Masked Singer. There’s just one slight problem — his guess is way off. The Season 12 semifinals arrive on Wednesday’s episode (Fox, 8/7c), bringing back Strawberry Shortcake, Wasp and Buffalos to battle for the two spots in next week’s grand finale event. Each of the three remaining contestants will give a friendship bracelet to the judge with whom they already share a connection, which is how we get this moment: “One of the highlights of my career was the press tour we did together,” Strawberry Shortcake tells Jeong in TVLine’s exclusive sneak peek below. “You made me laugh the entire day.” Jeong immediately remembers meeting Joey King in the green room of a daytime talk show, leading him to declare — with surprising confidence — that the Kissing Booth actress is under that costume. Watch the moment in full below: So, how do we know that Jeong’s guess is incorrect? Because the clues — not to mention the recognizable voice — all point to someone else: AJ Michalka! Though Jeong and Michalka have never shared the screen together (until now!), she was a series regular on ABC’s The Goldbergs while Jeong’s short-lived comedy Dr. Ken aired on the same network, making it entirely likely that they met while doing press. Jeong also mentions the mouse ears clue, claiming that it’s a nod to King’s two episodes of The Suite Life of Zack & Cody. In actuality, it’s a reference to the years Michalka and her sister spent on Disney Channel. Thus far, 12 celebrities have been unmasked this season: John Elway as Leaf Sheep, Yvette Nicole Brown as Showbird, Marsai Martin as Woodpecker, Paula Cole as Ship, Andy Richter as Dust Bunny, Laverne Cox as Chess Piece, Natalie Imbruglia as Bluebell, Bethany Hamiton as Macaron, Drake Bell as Ice King, Jana Kramer as Royal Knight, Bronson Arroyo as Sherlock Hound and Kobie Turner as Goo. Do you agree that Michalka is in the Strawberry Shortcake costume, or could it be someone else? And who are your guesses for Wasp and Buffalos? (You can see ours here.) Drop a comment with your thoughts on all things Season 12 below. Masked Singer Season 12 Celebs Revealed
html:
Ken Jeong thinks he knows which celebrity is hiding underneath the Strawberry Shortcake costume on The Masked Singer. There’s just one slight problem — his guess is way off.

The Season 12 semifinals arrive on Wednesday’s episode (Fox, 8/7c), bringing back Strawberry Shortcake, Wasp and Buffalos to battle for the two spots in next week’s grand finale event. Each of the three remaining contestants will give a friendship bracelet to the judge with whom they already share a connection, which is how we get this moment:

“One of the highlights of my career was the press tour we did together,” Strawberry Shortcake tells Jeong in TVLine’s exclusive sneak peek below. “You made me laugh the entire day.” Jeong immediately remembers meeting Joey King in the green room of a daytime talk show, leading him to declare — with surprising confidence — that the Kissing Booth actress is under that costume.

Watch the moment in full below:

So, how do we know that Jeong’s guess is incorrect? Because the clues — not to mention the recognizable voice — all point to someone else: AJ Michalka!

Though Jeong and Michalka have never shared the screen together (until now!), she was a series regular on ABC’s The Goldbergs while Jeong’s short-lived comedy Dr. Ken aired on the same network, making it entirely likely that they met while doing press. Jeong also mentions the mouse ears clue, claiming that it’s a nod to King’s two episodes of The Suite Life of Zack & Cody. In actuality, it’s a reference to the years Michalka and her sister spent on Disney Channel.

Thus far, 12 celebrities have been unmasked this season: John Elway as Leaf Sheep, Yvette Nicole Brown as Showbird, Marsai Martin as Woodpecker, Paula Cole as Ship, Andy Richter as Dust Bunny, Laverne Cox as Chess Piece, Natalie Imbruglia as Bluebell, Bethany Hamiton as Macaron, Drake Bell as Ice King, Jana Kramer as Royal Knight, Bronson Arroyo as Sherlock Hound and Kobie Turner as Goo.

Do you agree that Michalka is in the Strawberry Shortcake costume, or could it be someone else? And who are your guesses for Wasp and Buffalos? (You can see ours here.) Drop a comment with your thoughts on all things Season 12 below.

Masked Singer Season 12 Celebs Revealed
